dict.string:
TMPFILE=`mktemp /tmp/tm-svk.XXXXXX` || exit 1
mv "$TMPFILE" "$TMPFILE.diff" TMPFILE="$TMPFILE.diff"
# -rBASE is the same as specifying no revision -- it's the version that you have checked out. "${TM_SVK:=svk}" diff -rBASE "$TM_FILEPATH" &> "$TMPFILE"
open -a TextMate "$TMPFILE" &
#rm "$TMPFILE" # ideally, we'd do this, but it creates a race condition, because 'open' is asynchronous.
